snippet: NewUrbanJazz, now in its third season, is gaining traction with audiences, and the word is out among local artists of national stature that the concert series is a useful forum for delving into formats they don’t often explore.
abstract: NewUrbanJazz concert series, now in its third season at ArtsWestchester performance space in White Plains, is gaining traction with audiences; word is out among local artists of national stature that the concert series is a useful forum for delving into formats they do not often explore (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: NewUrbanJazz, now in its third season, is gaining traction with audiences, and the word is out among local artists of national stature that the concert series is a useful forum for delving into formats they don’t often explore.

headline.seo: NewUrbanJazz Allows Artists to Stretch Out, Close to Home
